titles.title: Happy is the people that is in such a case (x3)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Happy is the people that is in such a case (x3)
Whose God is the Lord.
That our sons may be as plants grown up,
That our daughters may be as cornerstones,
That our garners may be full,
That our oxen may be strong,
And there be no complaining in our streets,
Hallelujah!
Happy is the people that is in such a case, x3
Whose God is the Lord.
